application_credentials.description:
Follow the [instructions]({more_info_url}) for [OAuth consent screen]({oauth_consent_url}) to give Home Assistant access to your Google Sheets. You also need to create Application Credentials linked to your account:
1. Go to [Credentials]({oauth_creds_url}) and select **Create Credentials**.
1. From the drop-down list select **OAuth client ID**.
1. Select **Web application** for the Application Type.

abort.already_in_progress: Configuration flow is already in progress
abort.create_spreadsheet_failure: Error while creating spreadsheet, see error log for details
abort.missing_configuration: The component is not configured. Please follow the documentation.
abort.no_url_available: No URL available. For information about this error, [check the help section]({docs_url})
abort.oauth_unauthorized: OAuth authorisation error while obtaining access token.
abort.open_spreadsheet_failure: Error while opening spreadsheet, see error log for details

create_entry.default: Successfully authenticated and spreadsheet created at: {url}

data_description.implementation: The credentials you want to use to authenticate.

reauth_confirm.description: The Google Sheets integration needs to re-authenticate your account
reauth_confirm.title: Authentication expired for {name}

append_sheet.description: Appends data to a worksheet in Google Sheets.

config_entry.description: The sheet to add data to.
config_entry.name: Sheet

data.description: Data to be appended to the worksheet. This puts the values on new rows underneath the matching column (key). Any new key is placed on the top of a new column.
data.name: Data

worksheet.description: Name of the worksheet. Defaults to the first one in the document.
worksheet.name: Worksheet

append_sheet.name: Append to sheet
